content: Good app, I DJ for my son's minor hockey games and it definitely takes it up a notch. Suggestions:1) it would be great to be able to put the songs in Main Playlist in order instead of random. 2) move the Next Song button away from the Play button (when scrolling for the next song I'm nervous I'll accidentally touch the play button) That's all for now, it's a really simple, great app that does the job well!

I have been using this app for a couple of years and love it. I have received so many positive comments from coaches, players and fans. Thanks for bringing our hockey games to life and giving the kids a big league experience.
replyContent: Thanks for the review and rating Ian. I am really glad everyone is enjoying the show that you are putting on and that Sport DJ is helping with that.

content: Great app. Would've given it a 5 star if their was spotify integration and more pre-loaded sounds and efx.
replyContent: Thanks for the rating and review Walter. Yes, integration with streaming music services like Spotify is my most requested feature and I would like it for myself as well. I am continuously looking for a way to do this but it is limited to the services that are exposed to developers.

content: Liking the app so far. Wish it was a bit more polished but over all its great. one question though. Running on android, can i transfer a whole profile and assigned songs from one device to another device to have the identical set up 9n both devices?
replyContent: Thanks for the review and suggestions are welcome for more polish. Yes you can copy the profile to another device by 1) Installing Sport DJ on the new device. 2) Copy all the music and the Sport DJ folder and replace it on the second device. 3) start up Sport DJ and it will take about 20 seconds to relink everything.

content: Easy to use! Makes our hockey games fun! The only thing that would make this a better app is having more buttons to program.
replyContent: Thanks for the review and rating and I am glad you are enjoying the app. A suggestion, if you want to use more buttons, I use the different profiles. For example, I have a set of buttons that I use in the third period of a hockey game and I just switch to that profile then. Let me know if you want to know how to copy settings between profiles.

content: Ok. Let me be very clear. I was going to design an app just like this for myself. Something told me, why not see if there is one available first? Sure glad I did. Best $7 I have ever spent. Did a test run with limited music within hours of downloading. People were impressed! I look forward to working with the developer to make this app even better. 5+ Stars.
replyContent: Thanks for the review Sebastian.  Yes please let me know what ideas you have to improve the app and I will get them in if I can.

content: Time consuming app, but worth the work. I still find many glitches trying to add songs or cancel adding songs where the app literally just kicks me out. I took this app out for a test drive today, I would also like to see continuous play on the intermission button, as of right now it only plays one song and stops. Would be nice if buttons were larger on the main screen and less of the folder showing the music titles, easier use for those of us who use our phones to run the app. What is picklist?
replyContent: Hi Kim, sorry you are having an issue with adding songs, I will have a look at it and get a fix out as soon as I can.  What you can do is press and hold the continuous play button and then you can set the intermission folder to play songs from.  There is a buttons only interface with larger buttons. Picklist is so you can find some songs quickly

content: Awesome. Works wonderfully for hockey games
replyContent: Thanks for the review John

content: Fantastic app! Does everything you need it to. I had a few questions about the app and the developer got back to me right away with great suggestions and fixes. Highly recommend this app.
replyContent: Thanks for the review Joe.

content: Great for the kids hockey games
replyContent: Thanks for the review Ryan.

content: Awesome app. Been perfect for my boys hockey games. Great customer service too.. any problems or questions I have had were solved and/or responded to almost immediately. Highly recommend!
replyContent: Thanks for the review Josh.

content: Works great. Functions well to DJ my daughters ringette games.
replyContent: I am glad you are enjoying using Sport DJ and thanks for the review.

content: It took some time to set up and customize my songs, but I'm looking forward to putting it into action this hockey season.
replyContent: Thanks for the review Bill.

content: Update 2019, I used this app all last season and it was great and getting ready for another. I like the updates that have been made. One suggestion though, it would be nice to have the option to set the volume level for each song in the same area we adjust starts and stops. This would way better than adjusting on the fly. I use this app on a Samsung phone and it works great. Thank you
replyContent: Thanks for the review Chris!

content: App does everything it advertises. It makes running entertainment at games seamless (and brainless). I've had many comments from spectators about how great the music is. Yet, all I did was press a button labeled with the activity that just occured on the ice. Lots of websites provide song ideas for penalties, goals, saves, etc. Just build playlists and go. Even has built in goal horns. Easy set up. Easy use. Functionally customizable. Great features. Fantastic support. Running on Samsung S8.
replyContent: Thanks for the review Lee.

content: Can't seem to upload my songs from my google play playlists (that are downloaded to my device). Please guide me as to how to do this, or I require a full refund. Thanks. When this problem is corrected, I will edit my review. Update: mp3va works to uplaod songs to the app, but in "game mode" when the home goal button is pushed, the app shuts down and does not play any songs. Update 2: Sport DJ did email and respond to the error and fixed issue by recoding. They did well with communication.
replyContent: The bug you noted has been fixed.  Unfortunately Sport DJ does not work with streaming music services like Spotify or Google Play Music.  You need to have the songs downloaded on the device and playable from other applications.  I recommend getting music from www.mp3va.com where you can get almost anything for $0.15 each.

content: This App is unbelievable….It is so easy to setup and operate for hockey games. I have just started to use it and everyone loves how professional everything sounds.
replyContent: Glad you are enjoying the app.  Thanks for the review Ryan.

content: i should have installed on my daughters phone. i thought it came loaded with all the music already my bad.
replyContent: Thanks for the review.  No, Sport DJ does not come with music - I could not do that legally and the download would be huge.  Contact me at support@gamedayapps.net, I might be able to help though.

content: Awful awful awful. Took my money but will not play my songs. Doesn't work at all. Total RIP off. If I could give it no stars, I would.
replyContent: Sorry you are having a problem. Are you trying to use Spotify or Google Play music?  If you email me at support@gamedayapps.net I will help you solve your problem.   It will play all standard music file types.  Also I have no problem giving you your money back if you are not happy with it.

content: I am changing my earliest review... Now that I was contacted and told how to fix my problem... I really like and enjoy the app for both my sons hockey and baseball home games where I do the majority of music for both teams...
replyContent: If you got a new phone, it may have not migrated properly.  Find the "Sport DJ" folder, rename it to "Sport DJ1".  If you restart the app should work again. You can then copy the files from the old Sport DJ folder to the new one to get your settings back. I have added the Chicago Blackhawks goal horn into the next release coming soon.

content: great app! look to make it even better!
replyContent: Thanks for the review James.

content: Freezes up to often. Not worth the money. $5.99 wasted.
replyContent: Sorry you had a problem Daniel.  I have refunded your purchase.

content: worked great on my Samsung s7. doesnt work on new s10... keeps closing. uninstalled and reinstalled twice, still not working. *UPDATE*  I changed the folder name and working again. Back up to 4 stars
replyContent: Sorry you had an issue Dan but glad you are working again.  If you also copy the files in the Sport DJ sub folders from the old Sport DJ folder to the new one, all your song settings will come back.  This is an issue with the folder permissions related to the Samsung migration tool hopefully I can work around in the next release.

content: Did not do anything I expected. I will not be using. Please refund payment.
replyContent: Sorry that Sport DJ was not what you were looking for.  If it is within 48 hours of purchase you should be able to do the refund yourself.  If not, please email me at support@gamedayapps.net since I can't refund without information to identify which purchase was yours.  I would be curious to understand what the problem was if possible as well.

content: I used this app for an entire baseball season, perfectly operated. Now it won't open at all.
replyContent: Hi Judy, sorry you are having a problem.  Please email me at support@gamedayapps.net and I will figure out the issue and get you up and running quickly.  The latest version handles migrations better and won't crash.  The Samsung migration tool does not move databases which is the source of the problem

content: this was just was my husband needed to do the music for my son's games. only thing that would make it better is if we can use music from an sd card to help with memory issues on his phone. Otherwise, no complaints here. ETA: thank you for your response, we have now been able to load songs from SD card. awesome job
replyContent: Thanks for the review.  You can load songs from the SD card however if you are using the load from a folder feature it will not work for the SD card.  You can load them from the standard add songs interface.  The feature will be expanded in the future.  Contact me at support@gamedayapps.net if you need more help

content: Great app for anyone that wants to provide music to a sporting event. also great service by author. Twice I've either requested something or mentioned an issue and I've received a response. App is so worth it.
replyContent: Thanks for the review drew and for reporting the issue.  I will work on a fix for this shortly.

content: Great Pro level App. I have been using a PC program for years for Hockey teams and took the plunge on this app. It is every bit as good as using my laptop and has many features to make it a pleasure to work the music for many hockey teams. I get many compliments on how professional this makes the music play.
replyContent: Thanks for the review Jason

content: sports DJ is a great app that makes life easier. especially during the heavy fast paced action of hockey games in Junior A GMHL hockey. been using the app for years at developer is very quick on fixes and upgrades. highly recommend this app for anybody needing game day music!
Motorola turbo 2. iPhone users at the rink would love to be able to use this app.
replyContent: Thanks for the rating Todd

content: Everyone thinks I am an awesome DJ! It's not me.Its the Sport DJ App. I can put all the boys favorite songs on the play list while working around the swears that the hockey moms dont want to hear.When I had an issue with the app the response was immediate and helpful, thanks Bryce🙂
replyContent: Thanks Shannon.  I am not sure how your Sport DJ database got corrupted but glad to have you back up and running quickly.  Thanks for working with me on this.

content: I loved it at first but I've noticed it doesn't detect download songs on my device. There are countless song I would love to use for my kids hockey games but the DJ app doesn't detect them even after running the DJ repair app.
replyContent: Hi Jeremy, are you downloading songs from Google Music or Spotify?  Sport DJ cannot see these songs and can only see songs stored in a music file format like .mp3.  These services protect playing their songs with digital rights management.  I get my songs from www.mp3va.com for $0.10 each.  Please email me at support@gamedayapps.net on the issue.

content: Love this app!  I use it all of the time for my kids hockey team and has simplified how I do the music.  I had an issue with the app the other day so I emailed the developer.  That night, he responded and gave me an update to try.    If only everyone had this type of dedication.  Perhaps the graphic interface could be prettier but when I'm using the app I could care less what it looks like - it is simple to use and that is what matters to me.  For a future update suggestion, I'd love a backup feature so that I can take all of my settings to a new phone.  Can't recommend it enough! !
replyContent: Thanks for the review.  Yes the UI is not the prettiest and I will work to improve that.  You can easily transfer your settings to another Sport DJ instance on another device.  Simply install Sport DJ on the new device, move all the songs over to it and then copy the Sport DJ folder from the old device to the new.  I can help if you have a problem.

content: App won't open on any if my Samsung phones.
replyContent: Sorry you are having a problem.  Sport DJ has been tested on many Samsung devices and I use many of them myself so I am not sure what the issue is.  Can you contact me at support@gamedayapps.net and I will get you up and running quickly or give you a refund.  Deleting the Sport DJ folder and rerunning the application will likely fix any corruption.

content:
I really like the set up of this app. It works great and makes it so much 
more fun. Being able to hit a sound effect very quickly is great instead of 
scrolling through a playlist to find what your looking for. I had one 
suggestion and the developer responded very quickly and helped me solve the 
issue the same day. Great customer service and thanks for a great app.
replyContent: Thanks for the review and suggestion.  The profiles may work well for what you are trying to do.  Try setting up a second profile (press on the Sport DJ label ) for offense or defence.  This will allow you find the songs easier and try the picklist here too.  Try renaming the profiles as well and let me know if this helps.

content:
I want my money back. For such a high rated app, it was below par. The 
lesser rated app worked better. Refund please. I'm contacting sprint too
replyContent: I am sorry that you were not happy with the app and have no issue providing a refund if you are not fully satisfied.  I am curious what the problem is and would appreciate it if you can email me at support@gamedayapps.net to arrange the refund.  If it is within 48 hours you can do the refund yourself.

content:
Love the app and the developer has been very responsive and assessed issues 
promptly. I highly recommend the app!
replyContent: Thanks for the review Jesse.

content:
I was unable to figure out how to upload songs based on options available. 
I downloaded songs from Samsung music to add to the app, but could not 
figure out how to attach to playlist. I tried for 15 mins to upload 1 song. 
No luck. Too time consuming and frustrating.
replyContent: Unfortunately Sport DJ does not work with songs downloaded with Samsung music, Google Play, Spotify etc.  These music services do not allow the songs to be played outside of their app.  The music file needs to be on your device as an mp3, wma etc.   I recommend getting music from www.mp3va.com where you can get almost anything for $0.15 each.

content:
The developer of this app went above and beyond to assist. When I 
downloaded, a major functionality glitch was discovered. I contacted the 
developer who walked me through multiple troubleshooting solutions. Once 
the problem was figured out, he quickly released an updated version of the 
app and it fixed the issue right away. The app itself is very easy to use 
and customizable enough to get the job done. Thanks so much!
replyContent: Thanks for the review

content: Purchased this app for baseball, and am using it on a Pixel XL. Many, many great features, and give it a strong 4.  However, there are significant issues that need prompt attention: 1.  The settings drop-down menu at the top right of the display is completely obscured in portrait and landscape when the large buttons profile is being used, and mostly obscured when the default mode is in portrait.  The only way to access the lower portion of the drop-down menu with the 'New Game' toggle is in landscape in default mode.  Please fix. 2. In order to link a button with music or sounds, you have to define the directory where that music or sound is located.  So while you can easily browse to the chosen directory, you cannot actually select the directory - you must type in the directory filename.  This is very counter-intuitive and frustrating. 3.  There appears to be a lag when you start/stop songs from a playlist in rapid succession.  I have encountered two songs playing at once as a result. 3 Recommendation: Provide a large toggle named 'MUTE' that overrides everything.
replyContent: Thanks for the review Dan and reporting of the problems.  The latest release fixes these issues

content: I can't get songs added to the playlist.....maybe there is something I can't figure out and if support helps me figure this out I will change my rating. But it won't load anything from Google play or Amazon music.... If I can't get this figured out I would really like a refund bc it is absolutely useless as is.  I contacted customer support and they were very helpful. I figured out how to get songs transferred to the app playlist per their suggestions and used it for our tournament this weekend and it was fantastic!! Very easy to use great app. Thank you for your prompt response and fruitful suggestions.
replyContent: Unfortunately Sport DJ does not work with streaming music services like Spotify or Google Play Music at this point.  You need to have the songs downloaded on the device and playable from other applications.  I recommend getting music from www.mp3va.com where you can get almost anything for $0.15 each.  Thanks for the updated review.

content: Really like the app. Clear interface to get started. Once you've played with it for a while you start to like all the little extras like being able to start a song any number of seconds into it. That's a really easy way to get right to the hook if you can't edit the songs down.   I use it for hockey and it's made our games a ton more fun for both the kids and fans.  And I gotta say I had a question before I downloaded the app and had a reply in a few hours. Great app and good people to work with.
replyContent: Thanks for the review

content: No longer works. Uninstalled, reinstalled tried a fix but nothing gets it to work and keep working. Renamed the file and it worked again but lost all the files. Reset it all but next time I opened it, it went back to error mode.  I used this from January to the summer of 2017 without issue and loved it but now it's useless.
replyContent: Hi Patrick, I am sorry you have had these issues.  I have posted version 17 which has improved error handling and should resolve this problem.  Please let me know if it does not.

content: The random fuction works great for all buttons except the big home goal button. The home goal button still plays everything in sequence no matter what setting is used for the random button. Thanks for adding the random feature.  Update: the newest release seems to be replaying songs before others have played. Sometimes it even plays the same song twice in a row.
replyContent: Thanks for the updated review Todd.  I will get the random feature fixed in the next release.

content: Worked well all winter last year -- I work High School hockey games. I had an issue with it this fall when I tried to reopen and update my song list. The company figured out the problem right away and sent me details on how to fix it. Great app!
replyContent: Hi Scott, It seems there are a few people who have had problems with the latest upgrade not going in correctly.  Can you email me at support@gamedayapps.net and I will get this corrected.  I have published a temporary app called Sport DJ Repair that corrects any database issues that can be downloaded from the Play store if required.

content: I've played music at my son's  hockey games for a long time now. I downloaded this app and have been using it for about 1 year now. It is an incredible app. It does everything that I'd want it to do and it's so easy... I can even run the scoreboard and do the score sheet at the same time! I highly recommend this app!
replyContent: Thank you for the review Earl.  Please let me know if there are any other features you would like or need

content: Sanding app for hockey! I just have one question. I made 4 goal horns and songs with this app is there any way I can send them to our team to see what one they would like?
replyContent: Thanks for the review.  Unfortunately there is no way to export the goal horn and song combination.   I will look into adding this in a future release.  Play it for them in the dressing room with a portable speaker.

content: Hello, Gilbert Hernandez emaild about helping us out. If you need to scroll down on the reviews, you'll find him. We need the same set up installed on my phone for his older team.  This app is way better than it appears.
replyContent: Hi Anahi, I emailed you the customized version since this feature is not in the main release yet.  There are a few more features in this version as well.  Also I am realizing that users do not know about all the features in Sport DJ so I will be putting together some YouTube videos so users can see the best ways to use the app.

content: The developers are awesome! They make sure you are satisfied with their product.... Thanks again for everything.
replyContent: Thanks for the updated review Gilbert.  Glad to hear the app is working the way you want it and I will put those features into the main release shortly.  Great ideas.  Thanks.

content: I paid more money for this app than I have ever paid for one and all of a sudden my music is being deleted from it each time I push a song to be played. Was working great before. Can anyone help? Or give a refund?
replyContent: Hi Adam,  would you be able to send me an email at support@gamedayapps.net and I will get this fixed.  Sorry for the inconvenience.   If need be I have no issue providing a refund but I would like to resolve the issue.

content: Getting errors, super clunky... would love a refund.
replyContent: Hi Casey, Can you tell me what errors you are getting.  Send an email to me at support@gamedayapps.net and if I can't get things working quickly for you I will give you a full refund.

content: What is the best music player to download songs to. So I can make a walkup play list for baseball. I tried moving from spotify and it won't let me.
replyContent: SportDJ does not currently support music streaming services and needs music on your device.  A good place to get music for 15 cents a song is www.mp3va.com and it has a huge variety

content: This app is pretty decent.   Would be nice if there was a pause button, and the song list buttons could be programmable to change the names.  They can do for now.  Nice if you could add more button lists, add delete.  I have an apple app that allows up to 16.  A previous song or an option to touch and move to any song.  The folder picking/add new songs interface is complicated as the keyboard gets in the way, hard to select folder.  Needs a minimize on it. Other then that, it is great
replyContent: The buttons can have their names changed by long  clicking a button and then clicking the change button name.  There is not a pause button but you can restart a song from where it stopped by pressing and holding the play button.  Thanks for the other feature suggestions.  I will see what I can get in  a future release.

content: Oops, thanks for the tech assistance Ryan. I finally found the file, deleted and re-loaded.  Working perfectly!  Really easy to set up and customize.  Well done!  Thanks again for your quick support!
replyContent: Glad to hear that the reinstall fixed the device related issue.  I hope you enjoy the app.

content: This is way more complex than what I am looking for. I just want an app like ballpark dj(apple app) that I can use for walk ups in softball. Hate that I paid money for something that I will not use. 😧
replyContent: Hi Tracy.  I have no problem providing a refund if you are not happy with the app, just send me the transaction number by email.  SportDJ does have a lot of features but it can also be simple and grow with you as you mix in more music into the game.  You can also email me and I can help you get it set up if you like.

content: Nice App!! Use it for baseball games, walkup music and sound effects. Works well for what I was hoping for. Had a few questions and emailed support and they were fast to respond. Looking forward to any updates and enhancements! !! 👍
replyContent: Version 11 is now out and I think that you will find it even easier for Walkup music.  Try the new picklist for this which makes it easier to deal with substitutions in the batting order.

content: The kids love hearing the song of their choice as they walk up to bat. This app makes it very easy to make that happen and still be able to watch the game without fumbling around to get ready for the next batter. Great app and would recommend to anyone who's looking for an easy to use app for baseball. Update: Used the app during a tournament this past weekend and it worked to perfection. Everything I hoped it would do happened at the press of a button. The kids and the fans had a great time!
replyContent: Thanks for the review Joe.

content: Awesome app. Thank you for telling me to make text smaller so I could find my songs... some songs with long names still have a tough time to be read at the end of their name. This sucks if you have names that are similar. One more thing... when I am playing a song and I click a different song to play, they don't fade perfectly.  There is a small gap of no sound as soon as you hit the button of the next song you want to play... any way around this???
replyContent: I have seen the blip when a song is playing and another one is started on some devices. This appears to be a bug in the underlying Android but I am looking for a work around or fix. It is not consistent and does not always happen.  Try stopping the song first before playing the next one if it is too annoying.  I will hopefully have a fix soon.

content: Fantastic App!  The layout is simple, programmable buttons make hosting events easy.  A definite must for any hockey parent!!!  Cheers.

App works well, but I am finding adding songs to be very clunky in this new version. Previously I was able to add all the songs in bulk by copying to the "SportDJ / Main " folder, but in the new version it does not seem to recognize any songs added this way.  Update March 2016: Was the functionality of looking for songs in the App folders every readded? I am still finding the add songs interface somewhat clunky. thanks
replyContent: Thanks Tom. The ability to populate song lists from folders has been added back in version 10.  Please let me know how this works and if there are any other features you would like to see.

content: UPDATED: V7. The best app of its kind for playing music at sporting events. Version 7 made the button labels easier to deal with and fixed a couple issues with timing and stability. Bumping up the rating from 4 to 5 stars but would still love to see a scrubber for previews, and a smaller font\better list when importing songs.  Criminal this isn't over 1000 downloads yet! Completely worth your 3$ and more. Buy it now, set it up, and give your kids team an almost pro level presentation.
replyContent: Thanks Matt.  More features are now available in version 10.  You can change the font size in the settings.  Also there is a new UI that allows you to see which song will play next on the buttons.

content: App would not work my Samsung Galaxy 4.
replyContent: Please try version 7 and let me know if you still see any errors.  You can email me for additional support as well.  Sometimes reinstalling resolves issues.  SportDJ has been fully tested on Galaxy S3 and S5 so S4 should have no issues.

content: The app is good it would be better if it worker with Google music also it crashed 3 or 4 times when using it at the rink.  Also it would help if it would play music at same level as sometimes it is not heard and others it is blaring.
replyContent: Version 7 (now available) resolves the stability issues on some devices.  Sport DJ plays songs at the recorded volume level and downloading songs from different sources can cause the problem you describe.  I have a separate volume control device to easily adjust the volume on the fly.  The volume controls on a phone/tablet are not great for this.

content: The app is very solid and usable, but here's what I'd like to see in future versions (and I'd be willing to pay up to $15 for this):  1. Ability to refine the interface. I don't need the song list on the main interface. I'd like larger buttons so that I don't press the wrong one. Some choices would be WONDERFUL.  2. Ability to create buttons for my own playlists. (Apologies if that option is there and I missed it.)  3. Ability to set start point in a song (minutes/seconds) and the fade-in time.  Thanks for the effort you put into this!  Nov 8th 2015 update: It turns out most of the features I asked for were already there, but I missed them. Bumped review to five stars. This addresses 99% of my issues. The app's author was also incredibly helpful via e-mail -- best Google app support I've ever had. Seriously think this app is worth $10.  We were livecasting a minor hockey game last night and the parent doing the play-by-play is not a 'techie' and found the app super easy to use to fill dead air during stoppages of play. He's an Apple owner who is looking to buy a Droid tablet specifically to use this app.
replyContent: Thanks Sean. Version 10 gives a new UI with larger buttons and the song name visible.

content: This app can make anyone seem like a professional DJ. I personally love it because I can carry my entire playlist for gigs in my pocket. Fantastic!

I love the cueing up feature.  And goal horn together makes a minor league game feel like the BIG LEAGUES.  Could be improved by allowing for a pause/start button so that if there's a quick whistle, users don't have to begin a new song but instead pause then continue with the current one.  When in, say the 'special' songs section, change the song list to reflect what under this button.
replyContent: Version 5 now has the feature to continuing playing the last song where you left off.  Simply press and hold the play button on a quick whistle.  Your second suggestion was part of the version 10 release with the alternate User Interface.

content: I used many apps to do music for youth hockey for many years.   all of them have been very frustrating in one way or another.  This app is great it lets you set playlist easily for game stoppages intermissions penalties goals and works flawlessly.  You can even merge the sample goal horns with songs just like the big stadiums do.  It only takes a few minutes to get your playlists set under each button.  Awesome.   Thank you sport dj!
How do I change the source where the app looks for music? Right now, it's looking at my ring tone list and it's not intuitive how to change it.
replyContent: The add song functionality will find all music files on your device including ring tones.  Just select your songs from the full list

content: Can you make it do a 1 second fade out?  The only suggestion I hear from players is how the song just abruptly ends when I press stop.  Thanks!
replyContent:
Version 4 fixes the fade out.  Many other features including 3 more playlist buttons and different styles of goal horns are now available.  
Version 5 now allows you to customize the fade out time from zero to 1.5 seconds.  The default is 0.5 seconds.
Let me know if you have any other suggestions.  Thanks.
